name: MasterChef
body:
### About
Small project to simplify management of hostings using knife-solo tool. Applied realtime logging.

### Status
The service/project is under redesign to add more modern features.

- Ability to deploy on Heroku
- Use modern JS and CSS frameworks

### Authors and Contributors
- @miry
- @bolkabolka
- @valeronm
- @mir4a
- @xmarvin
- @tmwh

### Setting up development machine

```ruby
bundle install
rake setup
bundle exec rails server
```

Run background jobs: `bundle exec rake jobs:work`


Start server and login with following credentials

```yaml
email: john@example.com
password: welcome
```

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with setup or have another ideas? [Contact support](http://www.jetthoughts.com/contact.html) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
